Issue.creator: rameshthoomu
Issue.summary: "docs badge" in fabric master, release-1.3, 1.2,1,1 is linking to "latest" docs
Issue.description: "docs badge" in fabric master, release-1.3, 1.2,1,1 is linking to "latest" docs. See the below link here https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/release-1.3/README.md the docs badge in above branches README.md is pointing to latest docs build which is release-1.4
